channel.title: Abouts on xenol's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on xenol's blog

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Adam and I enjoy playing with technology. I studied computer networks at the Faculty of Informatics and Information Technologies at Slovak University of Technology in Bratislava. When I was 14, I started playing with UNIX-like operating systems and never stopped since then. In my free time, I try to contribute to various open source projects or experiment with technology. Whenever I have to code, I do all my projects in Python.
